Package chess15.algorithm

Class ScoreEvaluator

java.lang.Object
chess15.algorithm.ScoreEvaluator
public class ScoreEvaluator extends Object
ScoreEvaluator is a class that evaluates the score of a board.

    • evaluate

      public static int evaluate(Engine engine)
      Evaluates the score of a board.
      Parameters:
      engine - The engine to evaluate.
      Returns:
      The score of the board from the perspective of the player that would make the next move.

      Calculates the mop up factor.
      Parameters:
      playerKing - The position of the player's king.
      opponentKing - The position of the opponent's king.
      playerMaterial - The material count of the player.
      opponentMaterial - The material count of the opponent.
      endgame - The endgame factor.
      Returns:
      The mop up factor.
